President Trump continues to trail Joe Biden by a significant margin nationally and in battleground states, new polls this week showed. They suggest that the president’s effort to focus on law and order hasn’t reshaped the race.

text:
It only took a few student parties for a coronavirus outbreak to spin out of control at the State University of New York at Oneonta. It is now the first SUNY campus to shut down because of the virus after trying to reopen for classes.
